00081 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00082 //  CLASS : sc_bit
00083 //
00084 //  Bit class.
00085 //  Note: VSIA compatibility indicated.
00086 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00087 
00088 class SC_API sc_bit
00089 {
00090     // support methods
00091 
00092     static void invalid_value( char );
00093     static void invalid_value( int );
00094 
00095     static bool to_value( char c )
00096         {
00097             if( c != '0' && c != '1' ) {
00098                 invalid_value( c );
00099             }
00100             return ( c == '0' ? false : true );
00101         }
00102 
00103     static bool to_value( int i )
00104         {
00105             if( i != 0 && i != 1 ) {
00106                 invalid_value( i );
00107             }
00108             return ( i == 0 ? false : true );
00109         }
00110     static bool to_value( bool b )
00111        { return b; }
00112 
00113 #define DEFN_TO_VALUE_T(tp)              \
00114     static bool to_value( tp i )         \
00115        { return to_value( (int) i); }
00116 
00117     DEFN_TO_VALUE_T(unsigned)
00118     DEFN_TO_VALUE_T(long)
00119     DEFN_TO_VALUE_T(unsigned long)
00120     DEFN_TO_VALUE_T(int64)
00121     DEFN_TO_VALUE_T(uint64)
00122 
00123 #undef DEFN_TO_VALUE_T
00124 
00125 public:
00126 
00127     // constructors
00128     // MANDATORY
00129 
00130     sc_bit()
00131         : m_val( false )
00132         {
00133             sc_deprecated_sc_bit();
00134         }
00135 
00136 #define DEFN_CTOR_T(tp)              \
00137     explicit sc_bit( tp a )          \
00138        : m_val( to_value(a) )       \
00139        { sc_deprecated_sc_bit(); }
00140 
00141     DEFN_CTOR_T(bool)
00142     DEFN_CTOR_T(char)
00143     DEFN_CTOR_T(int)
00144     DEFN_CTOR_T(unsigned)
00145     DEFN_CTOR_T(long)
00146     DEFN_CTOR_T(unsigned long)
00147     DEFN_CTOR_T(int64)
00148     DEFN_CTOR_T(uint64)
00149 
00150 #undef DEFN_CTOR_T
00151 
00152     explicit sc_bit( const sc_logic& a );  // non-VSIA
00153 
00154 
00155     // copy constructor
00156     // MANDATORY
00157 
00158     sc_bit( const sc_bit& a )
00159         : m_val( a.m_val )
00160         {}
00161 
00162 
00163     // destructor
00164     // MANDATORY
00165 
00166     ~sc_bit()
00167         {}
00168 
00169 
00170     // assignment operators
00171     // MANDATORY
00172 
00173     sc_bit& operator = ( const sc_bit& b )
00174         { m_val = b.m_val; return *this; }
00175 
00176 #define DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,tp) \
00177     sc_bit& operator op( tp b ) \
00178        { return ( *this op sc_bit( b ) ); }
00179 #define DEFN_ASN_OP(op) \
00180     DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,int) \
00181     DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,bool) \
00182     DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,char)
00183 
00184     DEFN_ASN_OP(=)
00185     DEFN_ASN_OP_T(=,int64)
00186     DEFN_ASN_OP_T(=,uint64)
00187     DEFN_ASN_OP_T(=,long)
00188     DEFN_ASN_OP_T(=,unsigned long)
00189 
00190     sc_bit& operator = ( const sc_logic& b );  // non-VSIA
00191 
00192 
00193     // bitwise assignment operators
00194 
00195     sc_bit& operator &= ( const sc_bit& b )
00196         { m_val = ( m_val && b.m_val ); return *this; }
00197 
00198     sc_bit& operator |= ( const sc_bit& b )
00199         { m_val = ( m_val || b.m_val ); return *this; }
00200 
00201     sc_bit& operator ^= ( const sc_bit& b )
00202         { m_val = ( m_val != b.m_val ); return *this; }
00203 
00204     DEFN_ASN_OP(&=)
00205     DEFN_ASN_OP(|=)
00206     DEFN_ASN_OP(^=)
00207 
00208 #undef DEFN_ASN_OP_T
00209 #undef DEFN_ASN_OP
00210 
00211     // conversions
00212     // MANDATORY
00213 
00214     // implicit conversion to bool
00215 
00216     operator bool () const
00217         { return m_val; }
00218 
00219     bool operator ! () const  // non-VSIA
00220         { return ! m_val; }
00221 
00222 
00223     // explicit conversions
00224 
00225     bool to_bool() const  // non-VSIA
00226         { return m_val; }
00227 
00228     char to_char() const
00229         { return ( m_val ? '1' : '0' ); }
00230 
00231 
00232     // relational operators and functions
00233 
00234     // MANDATORY
00235 
00236     friend bool operator == ( const sc_bit& a, const sc_bit& b );
00237     friend bool operator != ( const sc_bit& a, const sc_bit& b );
00238 
00239     // bitwise operators and functions
00240 
00241     // bitwise complement
00242 
00243     // MANDATORY
00244 
00245     friend const sc_bit operator ~ ( const sc_bit& a );
00246 
00247     // RECOMMENDED
00248 
00249     sc_bit& b_not()
00250         { m_val = ( ! m_val ); return *this; }
00251 
00252     // binary bit-wise operations
00253 
00254     friend const sc_bit operator | ( const sc_bit& a, const sc_bit& b );
00255     friend const sc_bit operator & ( const sc_bit& a, const sc_bit& b );
00256     friend const sc_bit operator ^ ( const sc_bit& a, const sc_bit& b );
00257 
00258     // other methods
00259 
00260     void print( ::std::ostream& os = ::std::cout ) const
00261        { os << to_bool(); }
00262 
00263     void scan( ::std::istream& = ::std::cin );
00264 
00265 private:
00266     bool m_val;
00267 };
00268 
00269 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00270 // relational operators and functions
00271 
00272 #define DEFN_BIN_FUN_T(ret,fun,tp)          \
00273     inline ret fun( const sc_bit& a, tp b ) \
00274        { return fun(a, sc_bit(b) ); }      \
00275     inline ret fun( tp b, const sc_bit& a ) \
00276        { return fun( sc_bit(a), b ); }
00277 
00278 #define DEFN_BIN_FUN(ret,fun) \
00279       DEFN_BIN_FUN_T(ret,fun,bool) \
00280       DEFN_BIN_FUN_T(ret,fun,char) \
00281       DEFN_BIN_FUN_T(ret,fun,int)
00282 
00283 // MANDATORY
00284 
00285 inline bool operator == ( const sc_bit& a, const sc_bit& b )
00286     { return ( a.m_val == b.m_val ); }
00287 
00288 inline bool operator != ( const sc_bit& a, const sc_bit& b )
00289     { return ( a.m_val != b.m_val ); }
00290 
00291 DEFN_BIN_FUN(bool,operator==)
00292 DEFN_BIN_FUN(bool,operator!=)
00293 
00294 // OPTIONAL
00295 
00296 inline bool equal( const sc_bit& a, const sc_bit& b )
00297     { return ( a == b ); }
00298 
00299 inline bool not_equal( const sc_bit& a, const sc_bit& b )
00300     { return ( a != b ); }
00301 
00302 DEFN_BIN_FUN(bool,equal)
00303 DEFN_BIN_FUN(bool,not_equal)
00304 
00305 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00306 // bitwise operators and functions
00307 
00308 // bitwise complement
00309 
00310     // MANDATORY
00311 
00312     inline const sc_bit operator ~ ( const sc_bit& a )
00313        { return sc_bit( ! a.m_val ); }
00314 
00315 
00316     // OPTIONAL
00317 
00318     inline const sc_bit b_not( const sc_bit& a )
00319        { return ( ~ a ); }
00320 
00321 
00322     // RECOMMENDED
00323 
00324     inline void b_not( sc_bit& r, const sc_bit& a )
00325        { r = ( ~ a ); }
00326 
00327     // binary bit-wise operations
00328 
00329     // MANDATORY
00330 
00331     inline const sc_bit operator & ( const sc_bit& a, const sc_bit& b )
00332         { return sc_bit( a.m_val && b.m_val ); }
00333 
00334     inline const sc_bit operator | ( const sc_bit& a, const sc_bit& b )
00335         { return sc_bit( a.m_val || b.m_val ); }
00336 
00337     inline const sc_bit operator ^ ( const sc_bit& a, const sc_bit& b )
00338         { return sc_bit( a.m_val != b.m_val ); }
00339 
00340     DEFN_BIN_FUN(const sc_bit,operator&)
00341     DEFN_BIN_FUN(const sc_bit,operator|)
00342     DEFN_BIN_FUN(const sc_bit,operator^)
00343 
00344     // OPTIONAL
00345 
00346     inline const sc_bit b_and ( const sc_bit& a, const sc_bit& b )
00347         { return a & b; }
00348 
00349     inline const sc_bit b_or ( const sc_bit& a, const sc_bit& b )
00350         { return a | b; }
00351 
00352     inline const sc_bit b_xor ( const sc_bit& a, const sc_bit& b )
00353         { return a ^ b; }
00354 
00355     DEFN_BIN_FUN(const sc_bit,b_and)
00356     DEFN_BIN_FUN(const sc_bit,b_or)
00357     DEFN_BIN_FUN(const sc_bit,b_xor)
00358 
00359     // RECOMMENDED
00360 
00361 #define DEFN_TRN_FUN_T(fun,tp)                                     \
00362     inline void fun( sc_bit& r, const sc_bit& a, tp b )            \
00363         { r = fun( a, sc_bit(b) ); }                               \
00364     inline void fun( sc_bit& r, tp a, const sc_bit& b )            \
00365         { r = fun( sc_bit(a), b ); }
00366 
00367 #define DEFN_TRN_FUN(fun) \
00368     inline void fun( sc_bit& r, const sc_bit& a, const sc_bit& b ) \
00369         { r = fun( a , b ); }                                      \
00370     DEFN_TRN_FUN_T(fun,int)                                        \
00371     DEFN_TRN_FUN_T(fun,bool)                                       \
00372     DEFN_TRN_FUN_T(fun,char)
00373 
00374     DEFN_TRN_FUN( b_and )
00375     DEFN_TRN_FUN( b_or )
00376     DEFN_TRN_FUN( b_xor )
00377 
00378 #undef DEFN_BIN_FUN_T
00379 #undef DEFN_BIN_FUN
00380 #undef DEFN_TRN_FUN_T
00381 #undef DEFN_TRN_FUN

00389 {
00390     a.print( os );
00391     return os;
